review: Not as good as a Roku, but better than a Chromecast.  The remote is an especially welcome feature and the menu is pretty easy to navigate.  My only gripe is it seems to lose the connection a lot and always reports my internet connection as "Very Good (with problems)" but never gives details as to what the problem is.Overall this is great for a spare bedroom TV or a kid's room TV, but I wouldn't want this to be my main go-to in a living room.
